website_summaries.verdict: Add an extra personal touch to your wedding cake with this elegant cake topper.
pros: Personalized topper includes your name and wedding date
Elegant cursive writing design with smooth, precise edges
cons: Topper sits at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Product quality and free shipping
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for plastic, arrived early. My only problem was it had a crack/broke on the "M" in Mr. It was where the plastic was thin. I was able to glue it so you couldn't tell. There was no time to send it back or worry about getting a new one so that's why I glued ours. It's possible that during shipping is when it was broke. But after glueing we were able to use it. But all in all very nice product and ours came early. If I had to order it again. I would.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: The custom wedding cake topper was precision cut with perfect edges. Considering this was a customized order, the shipping was also really fast! I chose the plain wood grain for a natural finish.
customer_reviews.author: SweeeeeetAs

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: The cake topper is very cute! It did not make it to the wedding in one piece but the piece that broke off was not missed. So to answer the sturdy question NO! value for the money NO could hve been cheaper and I would not complain. Durability NO it didn't make to the wedding without breaking. Again, its cute, it served its purpose for pictures and it was readable. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Product came just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This product came exactly as described! I ordered the cherry colored wood. I’ve included photos of front and back to show the color is finished on both sides. This piece feels quite solid. I’ve also included a photo to show the width of the sign (approximately 1/8 inch) which appears to be a good size as I wouldn’t want anything too heavy on top of my cake! Shipped quickly! Only slight downside is that it smells a bit like burnt wood, but I believe that’s probably to be expected based on how it is constructed. Overall I would definitely recommend! Price is very good! (Several I priced on Etsy were more expensive.)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant looking
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way this looked on the cake, but as you can see in pictures the wall background was dark so it didn’t really pop in the picture. Should be placed against light background if you have the black. I didn’t give it 5 stars only because its very thin and delicate so after the wedding I tried to wash it to keep sake it and it cracked right in half but other than that I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Cake topper is sturdy and arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Cake topper is sturdy and arrived in perfect condition. It shipped the same day I ordered it even though I did not pay for one day shipping. Love the box that it came with to store it in. The colour is beautifully bold and prominent. Added the perfect amount of blue to my wedding cake that I needed to complete the colour scheme. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Leslie

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect! and didnt take long at all to come ...
customer_reviews.text: it was perfect! and didnt take long at all to come in, but sadly it broke a few days ago but its already been a whole month since the wedding
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but mine was broken
customer_reviews.text: Its absolutely stunning. But I'm rating it a 3 because it was broken in two places upon arrival. I feel like it had to be that way when they put it in there because it was packaged between two pieces of Styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this for my cake topper. I have not tried it to see if it works ok, but should is very light and beautiful love it. Came with Styrofoam around it to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: clover queen

customer_reviews.title: Worth Customizing and Price
customer_reviews.text: I could not have chosen a better Cake Topper than this. I love the Writing and the Size is exactly as shown on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is very simple and pretty. Nothing big and crazy, came as expected. I’m not sure how “durable” it is, but I’m not taking it out of the box until it’s time to put it on the cake. I’ll update if it changes by then!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Our cake is made to look like birch bark and this will look perfect on top. I'm extremely happy with.this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hook

customer_reviews.title: Very Reflective
customer_reviews.text: I knew it would be gold mirror but it is SO reflective and you have to make an effort to move around with the lighting if you actually want to read it...
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: This cake top is beautiful! Exactly what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is beautiful! Exactly what we expected! We ordered the color, walnut for our daughters wedding. The color is what we expected as in “sturdiness”.... I guess it would be considered “sturdy” for a cake topper, but I consider it to be a delicate piece of woodwork. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jones

customer_reviews.title: It was absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: What wonderful sellers! They were more then fair with me. They sell a wonderful product and stand by it as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry B

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: This topper looked very elegant. I wasn’t sure what to expect. The first one came with the name misspelled. I reached out to the seller and received the corrected item within a week.
customer_reviews.author: L Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Loved this on my wedding cake!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Lined great on cake and good piece to keep after!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and sturdy product. I have a wedding cake to design this coming month and it looks great with what I have to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ships within hours of ordering!
customer_reviews.text: It shipped extremely fast, fast enough to where I was worried about how it would look. Arrived a day early and was absolutely gorgeous! It came exactly how I pictured. I am a very pleased customer

customer_reviews.title: A wedding must!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wedding item I’ve ordered! Great quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: jaimee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a cake topper for my wedding and when it came in I had gotten the heirloom box to keep it in. It was beautiful and all that I had picturd and then some. I ended up cancelling my wedding and they were so nice about my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stanton

customer_reviews.title: wonderful craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: I'm making my sons wedding cake. I was skeptical at first but once I got it I absolutely love it! I sent a pic to my son and his fiancé and they love it! Wonderful and sturdy!

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted wood, carefully packaged and arrived in one beautiful in piece. Here's hoping it will not get damaged in transit (to Amsterdam!)

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sparkle and thickness! Better quality than I expected. Can’t wait to put this on our cake!

customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous!! We spray painted ours silver and got rave reviews at the wedding!

customer_reviews.title: It works great

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: This items was very cute, BUT it was broken the minute it came out of the packaging. My friends had to hot glue it during the wedding to be able to put it on the cake and use it.

customer_reviews.title: We loved our cake topper and made the cake look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved her cake topper and made the cake look beautiful. The personalization gave that extra special touch to her wedding cake.

customer_reviews.text: OMGG It is absolutely beautiful. I was worried about how durable it is, and its perfect. I cant wait for out guest to see our cake with this beautiful topper!! Definitely worth the purchase. Shipping was super fast. Very satisfied customer.

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing
customer_reviews.text: My fiance was in love with everything about it. Great deal for your mo.ey and amazing quality.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is gorgeous! We got it in the dark wood and I love it! It didn’t take long to receive it in the mail.

customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my personalized wedding cake topper! It is so beautiful and I can’t wait to put it on my wedding cake!

customer_reviews.title: Great job!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my daughter's wedding cake and it is beautiful! Well crafted and came surprisingly fast. I figured because it was customized it would take much longer. It didn't! The price was nice too! Thank you! 😊

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great/Shipped Fast

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful work! Beautiful product! Great service!
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute order (ordered Monday delivered Friday same week). Custom cake topper for my son's covid wedding since we couldn't use the venue that was planned. It turned out beautiful, I chose the walnut. Totally love it! I highly recommend this cake topper!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was just a little wabbly. Really had to press into the cake. Kind of cheap made piece of plastic but still looked cute. Would definitely get it in black if you’re looking for a more serious or elegant look

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Order the topper and within 2 hours it got a notification that it had been shipped. I had so nervous about it until it came in 2 days later. It was BEAUTIFUL! Perfect addition to my wedding cake

customer_reviews.title: Broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad because I ordered this for my daughter’s wedding August 17th and when I opened the box there was a crack in the M and one of the legs to hold it in the cake was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Callicutt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Made My Day.
customer_reviews.text: I abdolutely love this!! I ordered Sunday and recieved Thurs. I just am so happy of how perfect this cake topper is. If you have doubts about ordering I say go for it, Its just perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cake Topper!

product_meta.title: Personalized Wedding Cake Topper - Mr Mrs Cake Toppers w/Last Name and Date - Custom Acrylic Cake Decorations, Rustic Wedding Cake Topper for Bride and Groom - 5 Colors
product_meta.description: Color:Solid ColorsThis impressive acrylic cake topper is truly a work of art. Personalized with your new last name & wedding date - Click 'CUSTOMIZE NOW' to create your own unique cake topper. Adorable & completely food safe, simply insert into the top tier of your cake for a unique and sweet addition. It will perfectly fit on your cake and everybody will ask for it - Approx 5.5" - 6.5" wide. Laser cut from high quality shiny acrylic and food safe. This glorious wedding cake topper proudly crafted and elegantly produced by Be Burgundy in California, US.
feature_bullets: This impressive acrylic cake topper is truly a work of art. Personalized with your new last name & wedding date - Click 'CUSTOMIZE NOW' to create your own unique cake topper.
Adorable & completely food safe, simply insert into the top tier of your cake for a unique and sweet addition.
It will perfectly fit on your cake and everybody will ask for it - Approx 5.5" - 6.5" wide.
Laser cut from high quality shiny acrylic and food safe.
This glorious wedding cake topper proudly crafted and elegantly produced by Be Burgundy in California, US.
